attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The E-mail Number 10 petition is refused so I guess they only take petitions that suit the government

Give the petition site to an independent body.

rejection.details:
Your petition requested that Email the PM be reintroduced. As stated on the website and in our initial response to you, it will be reintroduced in the near future. Feedback on the website can be sent to admin@number10.gov.uk.

In the meantime, there are other means of communicating with the PM: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us http://www.number10.gov.uk/communicate/ask-the-pm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
